name: Risk of Sacrifices
description:
Don*t fullscreen! It'll make you unable to move.

note: there is a bug granting you unlimited healing, with we already fixed but can't upload yet due to the rules, as long as voting is ongoing, we will upload it afterwards.

We three are all fans of risk of rain so we chose to make a game like it, with a little twist to match the topic. To progress to the next level you will have to find and activate the teleporter. After surviving big waves of enemies for 90 seconds you have to sacrifices items to continue.

We sadly had no time left for sounds and music or more enemies :(

Movement: 

 arrow keys to move, 

 space to jump

 press up and down to climb ladders

press F to interact

Skills = q, w , e , r

Q = basic attack, no cooldown
W = teleport, 5sec cooldown

E = explosive shot , 6sec cooldown
R = invincible shield, 16sec, duration 4sec

ITEMS (they all stack)
  Chance to heal a lot on kill
Always heals on kills Invincibility lol

 One more Jump!

 Run faster

 Shoot Faster ( with Q )

Credits:

Hedog, Lonionjon, and derGenji
